title: Paul Rand numbers
content:
I believe those (awesome) numbers where design by hand by Paul Rand.  
Do anybody know where I can find something similar?

Thank you for your kind help.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Paul-Rand.com \_\_ Editorial.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20111017140530/http:/typophile.com/files/Paul-Rand.com%20__%20Editorial.jpg) | 34.41 KB |
author: logicalnot

comments.content:
I don't know of anything very much like those numerals, but the lighter weights of [Archer](http://web.archive.org/web/20111017140530/http:/www.typography.com/fonts/font_styles.php?productLineID=100033) are delicate with tiny ball terminals on many of the numbers.

- Mike Yanega
